Package org.bytemechanics.testdrive.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AssertException
    Exception thrown when some assertion fail
    DrivenTestCleanException
    Driven test clean phase unexpected exception
    DrivenTestException
    Driven test unexpected exception
    DrivenTestGivenException
    Driven test given phase unexpected exception
    DrivenTestInstanceParametersNotMatch
    Exception thrown when try to execute a test without the necessary parameters
    DrivenTestNotAccessible
    Exception thrown when try to execute a test that is not accessible by the test runner
    DrivenTestThenException
    Driven test then phase unexpected exception
    DrivenTestWhenException
    Driven test when phase unexpected exception
    EvaluationException
    Exception raised during test evaluation
    EvaluationNotAccessible
    Exception thrown when try to evaluate a test that is not accessible by the test runner
    EvaluationParametersNotMatch
    Exception thrown when try to execute a test without the necessary parameters
    EvaluationUnparseableParameter
    Exception to identify a non parseable parameter to the necessary class
    SpecificationCleanupException
    Exception raised during specification cleanup phase
    SpecificationException
    Exception raised during specification
    SpecificationNotInstantiable
    Exception thrown when failed trying to instantiate an specification
    SpecificationSetupException
    Exception raised during specification setup phase
    TestCleanException
    Exception raised during test clean phase
    TestException
    Exception raised during test
    TestSetupException
    Exception raised during test setup phase
